Module com.example.miniproyecto_3
Package com.example.miniproyecto_3.models

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto_3.models.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the battleship game, managing the player's board state, nickname, and providing methods for setting boat positions, checking shots, and verifying sunken boats.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String nickName)
    Constructor to initialize the player with a nickname and create an empty 10x10 board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickName)
      Constructor to initialize the player with a nickname and create an empty 10x10 board.
      Parameters:
      nickName - The nickname of the player.

  • Method Details

    • boatPosition

      public void boatPosition(boolean vertical, int i, int j, int value)
      Places a boat on the player's board either vertically or horizontally.
      Parameters:
      vertical - Indicates if the boat is placed vertically (true) or horizontally (false).
      i - The starting row index for the boat.
      j - The starting column index for the boat.
      value - The size of the boat (1-4).

    • freePosition

      public boolean freePosition(int i, int j)
      Checks if a specified position on the player's board is free (contains no boat).
      Parameters:
      i - The row index to check.
      j - The column index to check.
      Returns:
      True if the position is free (value is 0), otherwise false.

    • checkShot

      public String checkShot(int i, int j)
      Evaluates a shot on the player's board and updates the board state.
      Parameters:
      i - The row index of the shot.
      j - The column index of the shot.
      Returns:
      "Tocado" if the shot hits a boat, "Agua" if it hits an empty cell.

    • getPlayerTable

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> getPlayerTable()
      Gets the player's board.
      Returns:
      A 2D ArrayList representing the player's board.

    • getValue

      public int getValue(int i, int j)
      Retrieves the value at a specific position on the player's board.
      Parameters:
      i - The row index.
      j - The column index.
      Returns:
      The value at the specified board position.

    • checkBoatSunken

      public boolean checkBoatSunken(int row, int col, int value)
      Checks if a boat at a specified position is completely sunken.
      Parameters:
      row - The starting row index to check.
      col - The starting column index to check.
      value - The size of the boat being checked.
      Returns:
      True if the boat is completely sunken, otherwise false.

    • getPlayerNickName

      public String getPlayerNickName()
      Retrieves the player's nickname.
      Returns:
      The player's nickname.
